function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased psychological distress in the general population due to strict movement restrictions and isolation procedures during COVID-19 crisis in Malaysia.","Impact":"Potential development of psychological disorders such as anxiety and depression, as well as increased stress levels.","Mitigation":"Implementation of psychological interventions and support services to address psychological distress in the general population.","Technologies":"Psychological first aid (PFA), ultrabrief psychological interventions (UBPI) module.","People":"General population of Malaysia.","Owner":"Healthcare providers, mental health professionals."},{"Description":"Healthcare providers, especially those on the frontlines, at increased risk of psychological distress and vicarious trauma due to COVID-19 crisis.","Impact":"Potential development of pathological illnesses such as post-traumatic stress disorder, anxiety, and depressive disorders among healthcare providers.","Mitigation":"Implementation of psychological interventions, rapid adaptation skills training, and psychological first aid (PFA) for healthcare providers.","Technologies":"Psychological first aid (PFA), ultrabrief psychological interventions (UBPI) module.","People":"Healthcare providers.","Owner":"Healthcare institutions, mental health professionals."}]}
